channel.title: Root User Password Wont Change
channel.description:
So as usual, I attempted changing the default credentials for my workstation. When I change my root user's password from *changeme* it says the password was successfully changed. But when I go to do anything as the root user, it still has my password as *changeme*. I have tried running "passwd root" to no avail.
Any suggestions as to why this may be happening?
